short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple app that allows you to open multiple stream chat from twitch or kick and have all messages coming in integrated into a single window - Used to get better overview of messages when multi streaming. Can also be used with OBS so that viewers can see chats comming in from both platforms while multi streaming.
